title: Google\Identity\AccessContextManager\V1\AccessContextManagerGrpcClient
name: AccessContextManagerGrpcClient
description:
API for setting [access levels] [google.identity.accesscontextmanager.v1.AccessLevel] and [service perimeters] [google.identity.accesscontextmanager.v1.ServicePerimeter] for Google Cloud projects. Each organization has one [access policy] [google.identity.accesscontextmanager.v1.AccessPolicy] that contains the [access levels] [google.identity.accesscontextmanager.v1.AccessLevel] and [service perimeters] [google.identity.accesscontextmanager.v1.ServicePerimeter]. This [access policy] [google.identity.accesscontextmanager.v1.AccessPolicy] is applicable to all resources in the organization.

AccessPolicies

Extends \Grpc\BaseStub
